name: KING OF THE BEACH® Miramar® Beach Volleyball - Official Game Ball
short_description: 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻𝗲𝗱 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗞𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗼𝗳 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗕𝗲𝗮𝗰𝗵 & 𝗞𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗼𝗳 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗖𝗼𝘂𝗿𝘁️: Purpose-built for the elite beach volleyball athletes. Miramar️ signature touch offers superior control and softer contact, ideal for beach volleyball, volleyball outdoor, and advanced men's volleyball performance.

𝗢𝗽𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘇𝗲𝗱 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗺𝗲𝗻’𝘀 𝗣𝗿𝗼 𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘆: Balanced weight and textured grip support precision passing, fast transitions, and superior handling in all conditions. Official ball - Queen & King of the Court️, King of the Beach️ and AAU Championship Crown Series Tours.

𝗘𝗻𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗔𝗹𝗹-𝗪𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿 𝗗𝘂𝗿𝗮𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆: Sand-Tec composite surface absorbs less moisture and maintains grip on hot or wet sand. Outperforms all outdoor volleyballs used in competitive beach volleyball play worldwide.

𝗜𝗻𝘀𝗽𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗯𝘆 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗚𝗹𝗼𝗯𝗮𝗹 𝗠𝗜𝗥𝗔𝗠𝗔𝗥️ 𝗖𝗿𝗼𝘄𝗻 𝗠𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁: Official Ball of the Queen & King of the Beach️ , King of the Court️, AAU Crown Series Tours, national and global championships. Trusted by Olympians and grass roots athletes alike. Ideal for beach volleyball play for boys, men and serious enthusiasts.

𝗢𝗳𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝗠𝗜𝗥𝗔𝗠𝗔𝗥️ 𝗖𝗿𝗼𝘄𝗻 𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆: From the original creators of the King of the Beach️, King of the Court️ and King of the Snow️brands. The Crown Brands were originally founded on Miramar Beach, Santa Barbara in 1983. Crafted by hand. Designed in Corona del Mar, California.

short_description: SOFT & COMFORTABLE - This training volleyball is made of premium soft and durable PU for just the right touch, which helps to improve your hitting feeling while effectively protecting your arms and reducing pain caused by long-term training

HIGH RESILIENCE - The carefully selected material and exquisite craftsmanship make this high-performance official volleyball. Besides soft PU, the high-density nylon wrapping yarn and imported rubber bladder ensure excellent elasticity and stability

STURDY & DURABLE -Our indoor & outdoor volleyball adopts reinforced pull-resistant thread, combined with precise machine sewing technology to make it not easy to unstitch and ensure the beach volleyball's durability and long product life

VERSATILE VOLLEYBALL - whether indoors, outdoors, pool，on the beach, or the water, our soft volleyballs are perfect for you. This size 5 light volleyball with a diameter of 8.2 is easy to control and ideal for beginners, youth, seniors and professional athletes

CUSTOMER SERVICE - This soft volleyball will be deflated before shipment to ensure transportation safety (The Pump is Not Included). We are committed to providing you with a pleasant purchasing experience. Please feel free to contact us with any questions
product_description: About Us BYAOSUN has been focusing on the steady development of ball sports products, and every production step is strictly checked to ensure product quality. At the same time, we continuously invest energy to launch new designs and integrate stylish elements into products that have been warmly sought after by consumers worldwide. Great Airtightness The embedded valve of this sand volleyball is designed with a unique structure to prevent air and water leakage, making it easy to clean so that you can play volleyball on the water. High Durability The high-density nylon wrapping yarn makes the training ball firm and not easily deformed. The high-quality craft makes the volleyball more wear-resistant, and it is not easy to wear even after prolonged training. More Healthy Let's put down electronic devices and exercise with family and friends. Not only can we exercise our bodies and enhance our relationships and create more beautiful memories. This soft ball is also an ideal gift for friends and family for anniversaries, birthdays, and Christmas. After Sales Service For this outdoor & indoor volleyball, you will get 100% customer support.
